attributes.action: Make ages 14+ able to work a paying job
attributes.additional_details: So children can learn how to communicate and show business skills such as team work from young ages also shows how to control money and gives struggling family's a chance to earn more if there children work and help provide / teen mum's have a chance to get a job and supply for there kids
attributes.background: The legal age people can get a job is 16+ with a cv we should make it 14+ with a background check

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Children are able to work from the age of 13. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/child-employment
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, such as be able to work full time (and therefore leave full time education) from age 14.
